item.title: Human killings by tigers in Adilabad trigger fake videos on social media
item.description: Human killings by tigers in Adilabad trigger fake videos on social media A video of a tiger resting calmly on a tarred road was shared widely in WhatsApp groups on Wednesday and Thursday, triggering panic.
